name: Steinplatte
description: In the middle of the Tyrol-Salzburg-Bavaria border triangle and easy to reach from Waidring (AT) and Reit im Winkl (D), the Steinplatte delights with 42 top slope kilometers, magnificent panoramic views and great activities for non-skiers.The Steinplatte-Winklmoosalm offers a colorful variety of attractions for families and children: The Funline with fun dinosaur elements ensures smiling faces and the Steinplatte Snowpark with its three sections guarantees action and freestyle fun for all skill levels.The wide and perfectly groomed slopes in all levels of difficulty ensure a fantastic
